Eyes.title: Eyes

System
#system

secret police 
Spies 
report citizens for rule violations 
conduct arrests, interrogations, and disappearances 
feared by everyone

#system

low-ranking soldiers
security personnel
perform basic military or police functions

System.title: System
System.content:
system

totalitarian theocratic regime
Republic of Gilead (former United States)
Government controls

reproduction
language
movement.


there are no women rights anymore

The_Commander.content:

The commander Offred serves
has the title of a commander
At the absolute top
believes in the new system
is alive at the end
